Hi,All,

I have to create EditUser object for writing=A0junit=A0test for a
=
method of it. The constructor of class EditUser :

public EditUser(Token to=
ken, MessageResources messages, URLBaseDynaForm
form)
throws Exception {
su=
per(token, messages, form);
setDisplay(false);
}

And from class hierarchy =
of=A0URLBaseDynaForm,

class hierarchy of=A0URLBaseDynaForm

----------------------------

+-org.apache.struts.action.=

torActionForm

we know that it is a dynamic form; I can=
 not new this dynamic form
directly as below,

URLBaseDynaForm urlBaseDynaF=
orm =3D new URLBaseDynaForm();

After googing, I got a solution:

DynaBean =
form =3D new WrapDynaBean(EditUserVO); // EditUserVO is a POJO

DynaBean is=
 a interface that is implemented by DynaActionForm class.

It seems OK. But=
 I have to modified the constructor of EditUser to
satisfy this operation -=
it is unacceptable for me to change source code
for writing Junit test case=
s.

public EditUser(Token token, MessageResources messages, DynaBean form)
=
throws Exception {
super(token, messages, form);
setDisplay(false);
}

any =
other ideas for replacing this solution? and then how to create
a=A0my URLB=
aseDynaForm object? Your help will be highly appreciated.
